modName: More powerful Fury Frenzy and Mayhem
summary: Makes the spells Fury, Frenzy and Mayhem much more powerful; now you can keep using them after reaching level 60
descriptionHtml:
As a Mage, I got quickly sick of the fact that even with 100 illusion and all the perks, I couldn\'t make some bandits go mad, even with Mayhem. So I made this mod.
Without any perks, these are the base levels the spells affect:

Fury - 12
Frenzy - 30
Mayhem - 40

These can be improved with perks. The pictures are with 100 illusion and all perks, to give you an idea.

IF YOU WANT ALL YOUR ILLUSION SPELLS (Except Invisibility and Muffle) MORE POWERFUL, DOWNLOAD THIS MOD INSTEAD: http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=5652
author: Rafalema
